Text:
Gamma stands before Nu and No. 666, eager for a sword
fight, when a certain someone appears in front of the
three of them...
Facing you wouldn't benefit these two in any way.
Beta! What's that supposed to mean?!

I mean exactly what I said. If your swords don't
clash, they won't get any training; if they do,
someone's getting hurt.
W-Well...

(This is the second member of the Seven Shadows,
Lady Beta... I feel like I've heard her voice before.
There's something enigmatic about her.)
A-Anyway! Did you have some business here?

Not business, per se. I just came to see the face of
the individual we'll soon be working with...that's
all.
...Oh, I see.

I'm sorry for not introducing her sooner, Lady Beta.
This is—
Yes, I know about No. 666.
That's right. My apologies.
Y-Yes!

Lady Alpha and Epsilon are currently on their way
to investigate something. Once they return, they'll likely
have something to tell you.
U-Understood!

Although it's not directly related to the Cult, it's
still an important matter. Wait for Lady Alpha to
convey the details to you.
...Understood!

(Something to tell me... Maybe it's a mission or
something? In any case, I'll give it my all!)

Both myself and Mitsugoshi will be ready to move at
any moment.
And, of course, I'll have my sword ready as well!
That won't be...no, I think that's wonderful.

Indeed. Now, we just wait for Lady Alpha, Epsilon,
and Zeta to report back...

Well, not that I think there's any need to worry
about those three...

On the night Beta makes contact with No. 666, Alpha
and Epsilon investigate the forest near the Lawless
City, guided by Zeta...

...This forest has an incredibly unsettling air about
it.

We've been exploring it for a few days, and it grows
more ominous by the day.
The cause is the tower, no doubt.
But why now?

We'll also need to investigate that and find out
what's happening...
Shh! Both of you, stop. ...Look there.
...Ghouls flooding out of the Lawless City.
I see... So that explains the investigation request.
Graaarghhh!
Oh, looks like they noticed us.

Both of you, be on your guard. And, Epsilon, put on
your slime bodysuit.

Understood! We'll just have to defeat them now that
we've been seen!

Be careful, you two. They can be surprisingly
troublesome.
True. Their numbers are a pain, but...

They're no match for three of the Seven Shadows.
Let's go!
Indeed, we'll make quick work of them.
